FuncDef: This command configures the default credit values for RADIUS credit control and Diameter Gy application credit control.
CLIs: default-credit volume <credits> [ bytes | kilobytes | megabytes | gigabytes ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the default value for the volume credit and the unit in which the default value is expressed. Values-1 to 4294967295 (minimum 1 byte).
Specifies the default value for the time credit, in seconds. Values-1 to 4294967295 (minimum 1 second).
